Psa 7:Title: Cush
The sons of Shimei; Shelomith, and Hazie: Father Of Shelomith And Haziel And Haran
And there came one that had escaped, and: Father Of Mamre And Eshcol And Aner
And Moses said unto Joshua, Choose us ou: Joshua - Oshea - Jehoshua - Jehoshuah - Hoshea - Jeshua - Jesus
And she had a sister called Mary, which: Father Of Martha And Mary And Lazarus
And when Jesus was come into Peter's hou: Mother Of The Wife Of Simon-Peter
